00016         CScriptObject::CScriptObject()
00017                 : m_object(0)

00023         void CScriptObject::FinalConstruct(PyObject* obj)
00024         {
00025                 ASSERT_STRICT(obj);
00026                 m_object = obj;
00027                 Py_INCREF(m_object);
00028         }
00029 
00031 
00032         CScriptObject::~CScriptObject()
00033         {
00034                 Py_XDECREF(m_object);
00035         }
00036 
00038 
00039         bool CScriptObject::HasMember(const char *mem_name)
00040         {
00041                 int res = PyObject_HasAttrString(m_object, mem_name);
00042                 ASSERT_SOFT(res != -1);
00043                 return res == 1;
00044         }
00045 
00047 
00048         bool CScriptObject::GetMember(const char* mem_name, SScriptAny& out_val)
00049         {
00050                 PyObject* member = PyObject_GetAttrString(m_object, mem_name);
00051 
00052                 if(!member) 
00053                         return false;
00054 
00055                 bool ret = CScriptManager::sInstance->MakeAny(member, out_val);
00056                 Py_DECREF(member);
00057 
00058                 return ret;
00059         }
00060

00063 } // namespace
